dct_title_s: Shawmut 1630--Boston 1930~~Three hundred years of progress. Boston ancient and modern in picture and story
dct_alternative_sm: Shawmut 1630--Boston 1930 : Three hundred years of progress. Boston ancient and modern in picture and story
dct_description_sm: This map is altogether a personal and private contribution. Anything of historical interest to Bostonians is looked upon by the author as appropriate material. Dimensions: 40 x 50 centimeters, on sheet 43 x 56 centimeters
